Email_1.Subject: Glitch in the System
Email_1.Body:
Guess we won't know who accused Vincent of the
    voter fraud. Well I guess this is another
    glitch in the flagging algorithm. For every
    bad accusation, our system gets little bit
    smarter.
            
    Your next assignment is ready. Apparently
    there has been a 'hacker' that broke into our
    security and has been manipulating the
    databases. We suspect that he was a previous
    worker of ours. Find him and bust him.

Email_2.Subject: Someone Must Have Done It
Email_2.Body:
It is really frustrating seeing the system
    flag innocent people. Hopefully the engineers
    can actually create a good algorithm for once.
